import React from 'react' import { useSelector } from 'react-redux' import { Link } from 'react-router-dom/cjs/react-router-dom.min' import { PostAuthor } from './PostAuthor' import { TimeAgo } from './TimeAgo' import { selectPostsById } from './postsSlice' import { useGetPostQuery } from '../../api/apiSlice' export function SinglePostPage({ match }) { const { postId } = match.params const post = useSelector((state) => selectPostsById(state, postId)) if (!post) { return (

post not found

) } return (

{post.title}

{post.content}

Edit Post

) }
